args: Please note that this story contains spoilers\nfor the ＂The Hunt for Harmony＂ event.
Also, portions of this story have been translated\nfrom their original language.

Translation from original dog language:

(Hi there! I'm Rolf. The lady giving me a
bath right now is my partner, Laranoa.)
Hold still, Rolf! I've gotta get in there\nand work these tangles out...
(She was chosen to be the next chief of\nher village. Leading a pack is a lot of work,\nwhether you walk on four OR two legs!)
(The stress has gotten her down on more\nthan one occasion. But ever since she\ncame to this big castle here...)
Heya, Laranoa. Bath time for the mutt?
Yeah, we're going out soon. Want me to\nclean some of that stink off you, too? Hah!
Blaaaargh! You got dog water on me!
Nya ha ha! C'mon, you left yourself\nwide open there.
(This is Luca, Laranoa's old pal from when\nthey were pups. Goofing off with him\nseems to help her stress level.)
So where you takin' the fuzzball?
Oh, we've got a little date in town.
Wait, a date? Like, a DATE date?!\nSomeone actually decided to put up\nwith...all this?
(Hmph. Obviously Laranoa finds herself\nthe subject of many people's affections.)
Oh, my date is a real cutie, all right.\n...Okay, Rolf! Time to wash the suds off.
(She called it a date, but it's not the\nkind of date Luca is thinking of.)
...Woooo! Cold! Sweet! BRAIN FREEEZE!\nMan, this human ice cream is somethin'\nelse, all right.
Chatting and eating ice cream like this\nis all the rage among human girls!
Anyways, now that your brain is unfrozen,\ntell me a story of when Luccy was little.
A baby Luca story? Oh, I got tons of those.\nWhat flavor are you looking for?

Well, since he's always SOOOO cool,
I was hoping you knew a story where
maybe he's more of a derp. Something
to sorta contrast, you know?
Oh, you have come to the right lady;\nI've got a SUPER embarrassing story\nabout him! Okay, so one day...
(Heh. Laranoa sure looks to be\nenjoying all of this girl talk.)
(Her position as the next chief means she\nnever really had time to hang out with\nother girls her age.)
Ohmigosh, that is some serious Luccy dirt.\nI feel like my head is gonna burst!
Hey, so what should we do next?\nI'm up for whatever!
I was actually hoping to check out the\napothecary. You down?
...That was fun! But I've got some things to\ntake care of in the Mistholt, so let's meet\nback at the Halidom, yeah?
He should be picking herbs somewhere...\nAha! There he is!
(This fellow is another of Laranoa's\nchildhood friends named Sylas.\nHe always smells like rare plants.)
(He's another resident of the Halidom,\nand he's researching aromatherapy uses\nfor curing various illnesses.)
Hey, I got that medicine you wanted,\nso take it and be grateful, ya dork.
This is exceptionally rare and valuable!\nYou really found it for me?
Nya ha ha! It's not that big a deal.\nJust a little side trip to help out\nan old childhood pal, is all.
Hey, it's Aeleen and Ricardt! You guys\nhelping ol' plants-for-brains here?
We are indeed. In fact, the three of us are\njust about to participate in a group study\nsession regarding medicinal plants.

These two have a wealth of knowledge
when it comes to such plants. I thought a
meeting of the minds might give rise to
some fascinating discoveries.
Ha ha! Man, I remember when you used\nto think sylvans and humans should keep\ntheir distance from each other.

Once, yes—but Luca changed all that.
One can hardly hope to learn if they
remain trapped in the same narrow
outlook, after all.
(There are several smells on Sylas besides\njust plants. I bet he's been gathering\nmaterials from all over the place.)
Ah, right! I also picked some dayflowers.\nWould you deliver them to the young artist\nfor me? They will make excellent paints.
You mean Fleur? Sure, you got it.\nShe's gonna love 'em!
(This girl who smells of paint is Fleur.\nShe evidently aspires to be an artist.)
Yep! I made some really neat paints out\nof dayflowers and wanted to try 'em out.
Hey, I've got an idea—you and me\nshould do a big collaboration!
Yeaaaaah, but I'm a singer. I don't really\nknow much about paint and...stuff.
That's why we're gonna combine 'em!\nYou sing, and then I'll use that as\nan inspiration for my painting.
Right?! There's lots of people in the castle\nwith special skills, so I bet we could do\ntons of different collaborations.
It'll cross all the boundaries of genre\nand culture! Now THAT'S true art!
(Heh. It's great to see these young folks\nindulging their passions—although I'm\ngetting a bit tired of modeling here.)
Oops! Rolf rolled onto his back!
Well, I guess we'll just have to give up\non painting Rolf for now, and instead...\nHee hee!
H-hey! I wanna snuggle his tummy, too!
(Yesss... Obey your instincts, and bask\nin my fuzziness until your hearts are full.)
Dinnertime, everybody! ...Oh my gosh,\nRolf. You are SHAMELESS.
(Arooo! The evening meal is my favorite\ntime of day here at this castle.)
(It's where folks of all races from all parts\nof the world eat, talk, and make friends.)
So this is a natural Hinomotoan remedy,\nhmm? I'm deeply curious to know what\nmanner of ingredients it contains.
I'm happy to share some, if you like.\nEr, but it's a medicine I use for my\nstomachaches, so I can't spare TOO much.
Su Fang! Su Fang! I wanna see some\nstar-shaped pyroblossoms pleeeease!
Well, that sounds like quite the fun time.\nShall we come up with a color pattern\nfor them together?
(Each of these people has a dream,\nand with the help of all their friends,\nI'm sure they'll make them a reality.)
(Laranoa and I have grown a lot over\nthe years, and seen many new things.)
(But now we're ready to grow even more—\nnot only together, but along with all the\nfine people here at the castle.)
Oh, and there's a leftover bone with some\nmeat on it here. Interested?
(YES! YES YES YES!\nI'M A VERY GOOD BOY!)
